problem_names: lemma le_epred[iff]: "l < epred k \<longleftrightarrow> eSuc l < k"

lemma eq_infI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> n. enat n \<le> m"
    shows "m = \<infinity>"
translations: lemma le_epred[iff]: "l < epred k \<longleftrightarrow> eSuc l < k"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (l < epred k) = (eSuc l < k)
by (metis eSuc_le_iff epred_eSuc epred_le_epredI less_le_not_le not_le)

lemma eq_infI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> n. enat n \<le> m"
    shows "m = \<infinity>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  enat ?n \<le> m

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. m = \<infinity>
